## Functions

### createDependencyFile() {#a5cdb223afb9f4268a3716aaac56826bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static int createDependencyFile (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tgparser">TGParser</a> &amp; Parser, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; argv0)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a dependency file for <code>-d</code> option.

This functionality is really only for the benefit of the build system. It is similar to GCC&#39;s <code>-M&#42;</code> family of options.

Definition at line <a href="#l00081">81</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/main-cpp">Main.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then invoke one or more &quot;tablegen backends&quot; to emit information about the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// description in some predefined format.  In practice, this is used by the LLVM</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// code generators to automate generation of a code generator through a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// high-level description of the target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return early if any other errors were generated during parsing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (e.g., assert failures).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e5d0e3dd91cfca21762a24e128f184f">ErrorsPrinted</a> &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write output to memory.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.startBackendTimer(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Backend overall&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string OutString;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-string-ostream">raw&#95;string&#95;ostream</a> Out(OutString);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> status = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ApplyCallback will return true if it did not apply any callback. In that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// case, attempt to apply the MainFn.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tablegen/emitter/#ad8ce24c3c1a2d743d528e1bb58731d17">TableGen::Emitter::ApplyCallback</a>(Records, Out))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    status = MainFn ? MainFn(Out, Records) : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>.stopBackendTimer();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (status)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Always write the depfile, even if the main output hasn&#39;t changed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it&#39;s missing, Ninja considers the output dirty.  If this was below</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the early exit below and someone deleted the .inc.d file but not the .inc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// file, tablegen would never write the depfile.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="#a7c646cbf04903c936329264a31f2e674">DependFilename</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
